pageContext.claim: “And they've got a lot of rough people in those caravans. They are not angels. They are not. You saw what happened two days ago with the Mexican military and the Mexican police.”
pageContext.analysis: While there is no official count, most reports say the caravan is full of women and children. As for there being "rough people," any group that large is bound to have some bad apples, but "a lot" is an exaggeration even by the administration's count.
